summary: An ordinance granting permission to H.A. Parker Investments, Inc., to improve 43rd Place Northeast from 40th Ave. Northeast to 44th Ave. Northeast, and certain other streets, avenues and easements, by paving and otherwise improving the same, at its own cost and expense, providing for reimbursement to it from the City Street Fund for the cost of certain portions of the work and repealing Ordinance 92304.
